mergeResults.content: Identity: Adult Companion mare, brilliant white coat, silver hooves, sapphire eyes, silver-white mane; unpartnered for three years before this. Arc: Drew toward devastation by the Call; found Rance collapsed in crater surrounded by wild magic residue; recognized Gift-shock and uncontrolled awakening; Chose him despite his age, bitterness, and catastrophic first manifestation—'There is only the right Chosen for each Companion.' Relationship with Rance: Chose him after he examined evidence; bond formed when eyes locked—her mindvoice 'clear as crystal bells, warm as summer sunshine'; poured unconditional love into him, stabilized his fracturing mind with mental bridges across burned channels; revealed he caused the destruction himself; frustrated by his stubbornness (insulted when he called her 'horse,' irritated when he insisted on examining bodies, nipped his shoulder to get attention); accepts his determination but insists on Waystation stop for herbs/rest; their bond already stabilizing his wild Gift; shares his purpose to warn Haven. Abilities: Mind-speech with Chosen; can travel three times distance of ordinary horses; heightened magical senses.

- Identity: Adult Companion mare, brilliant white coat, silver hooves, sapphire eyes, silver-white mane; unpartnered for three years before this
- Arc: Drew toward devastation by the Call → found Rance collapsed in crater surrounded by wild magic residue, recognized Gift-shock and catastrophic awakening → Chose him despite age, bitterness, and destruction he caused—'There is only the right Chosen for each Companion' → rode four days/nights relentlessly to reach Haven, refused to leave his side despite exhaustion
- Stance: [Rance] Chose him after he examined evidence; bond formed when eyes locked—mindvoice 'clear as crystal bells, warm as summer sunshine'; poured unconditional love into him, stabilized fracturing mind with mental bridges across burned channels; frustrated by stubbornness (nipped shoulder when he ignored her, insulted when called 'horse'); reciprocal affection now established; suspects his Gift rarer/more dangerous than Firestarting, unprecedented in five centuries with no one capable of training it; promised to incapacitate him if he loses control; shares his determination to warn Haven
- Stance: [Rolan] Met Queen's Own Companion upon arrival at Haven
- Abilities: Mind-speech with Chosen; can travel three times distance of ordinary horses; heightened magical senses

- Identity: Adult Companion mare, brilliant white coat, silver hooves, sapphire eyes, silver-white mane; unpartnered for three years before this
- Arc: Drew toward devastation by the Call → found Rance collapsed in crater surrounded by wild magic residue, recognized Gift-shock and catastrophic awakening → Chose him despite age, bitterness, and destruction he caused—'There is only the right Chosen for each Companion' → rode four days/nights relentlessly to reach Haven, refused to leave his side despite exhaustion → witnessed unprecedented full mind-merge during memory recovery, confirmed his Gift as Mage-Gift—raw, wild type not seen since Vanyel
- Stance: [Rance] Chose him after he examined evidence; bond formed when eyes locked—mindvoice 'clear as crystal bells, warm as summer sunshine'; poured unconditional love into him, stabilized fracturing mind with mental bridges across burned channels; frustrated by stubbornness (nipped shoulder when he ignored her, insulted when called 'horse'); reciprocal affection now established; promised to incapacitate him if he loses control; increasingly awed by scope of his abilities while concerned about political/magical ramifications; shares his determination to warn Haven
- Stance: [Rolan] Met Queen's Own Companion upon arrival at Haven
- State: Exhausted from hard travel carrying unconscious Rance across Valdemar; coat dulled with road dust
- Abilities: Mind-speech with Chosen; can travel three times distance of ordinary horses; heightened magical senses

finalContent:
- Identity: Adult Companion mare, brilliant white coat, silver hooves, sapphire eyes, silver-white mane; unpartnered for three years before this
- Arc: Drew toward devastation by the Call → found Rance collapsed in crater surrounded by wild magic residue, recognized Gift-shock and catastrophic awakening → Chose him despite age, bitterness, and destruction he caused—'There is only the right Chosen for each Companion' → rode four days/nights relentlessly to reach Haven, refused to leave his side despite exhaustion → witnessed unprecedented full mind-merge during memory recovery, confirmed his Gift as Mage-Gift—raw, wild type not seen since Vanyel
- Stance: [Rance] Chose him after he examined evidence; bond formed when eyes locked—mindvoice 'clear as crystal bells, warm as summer sunshine'; poured unconditional love into him, stabilized fracturing mind with mental bridges across burned channels; frustrated by stubbornness (nipped shoulder when he ignored her, insulted when called 'horse'); reciprocal affection now established; promised to incapacitate him if he loses control; increasingly awed by scope of his abilities while concerned about political/magical ramifications; shares his determination to warn Haven
- Stance: [Rolan] Met Queen's Own Companion upon arrival at Haven
- State: Exhausted from hard travel carrying unconscious Rance across Valdemar; coat dulled with road dust
- Abilities: Mind-speech with Chosen; can travel three times distance of ordinary horses; heightened magical senses
